description:
11.267 unsharp
Sharpen or blur the input video.

It accepts the following parameters:


All parameters are optional and default to the equivalent of the
string ’5:5:1.0:5:5:0.0’.
name: unsharp

options.description: Set the luma matrix horizontal size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23. The default value is 5.
options.name: luma_msize_x

options.description: Set the luma matrix vertical size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23. The default value is 5.
options.name: luma_msize_y

options.description:
Set the luma effect strength. It must be a floating point number, reasonable values lay between -1.5 and 1.5.

Negative values will blur the input video, while positive values will sharpen it, a value of zero will disable the effect.

Default value is 1.0.
options.name: luma_amount

options.description: Set the chroma matrix horizontal size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23. The default value is 5.
options.name: chroma_msize_x

options.description: Set the chroma matrix vertical size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23. The default value is 5.
options.name: chroma_msize_y

options.description:
Set the chroma effect strength. It must be a floating point number, reasonable values lay between -1.5 and 1.5.

Negative values will blur the input video, while positive values will sharpen it, a value of zero will disable the effect.

Default value is 0.0.
options.name: chroma_amount

options.description: Set the alpha matrix horizontal size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23. The default value is 5.
options.name: alpha_msize_x

options.description: Set the alpha matrix vertical size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23. The default value is 5.
options.name: alpha_msize_y

options.description:
Set the alpha effect strength. It must be a floating point number, reasonable values lay between -1.5 and 1.5.

Negative values will blur the input video, while positive values will sharpen it, a value of zero will disable the effect.

Default value is 0.0.
options.name: alpha_amount
